message.body: Hey ##### since schools are delayed ####s assessment gets delayed too I think. Im not going to bring #### over since im not sure aboit the timing.
The slp is coming at 11, so is it ok if I still bring #### over - around 1030?
Was just about to text you - our power just went out at 9:20! And so our heat is off too, ugh...
The office opens at 10, but i think it's our whole building that's out. Prolly shouldn't take #### if we have no power :(
Oh no! You guys are welcome to come over here if you get too cold
Thanks! Hopefully it'll get resolved fast, I just left a message with maintenance.
Did you get your power back? Good luck at your interview tomorrow. Hope it goes well!
Yes, just before noon. Called this afternoon and they're actually having me interview Feb 5.
